author: Veronika Kero
title: This game combines beer pong with golf, and it's on sale for 15% off
description:
TL;DR: Keep yourself entertained at home with the PutterBall backyard golf game for $159.99, a 15% savings as of April 24.

The PutterBall Backyard Golf Game combines the best parts of playing mini-golf with the best parts of beer pong, for a fresh, innovativ…
